Paterson's Disciple Bacon:
Not yet. It contains all of my research so it can't be just a few pages.
Hunt Keros, Falena, Atrofa, Nuba, Torfedo, Aranea, Harane, Lesatanas, Arbor, Tergus, Skeletus, Atrofine, Orfen's Handmaiden Arimus and Orfen's Handmaiden Arima and gather 100 pages of the Floating Sea Journal.
